contactCta.title: Can't find your answer?
contactCta.description: Our support team is here to help you

1.question: How do I start using the app?
1.answer: To get started, go to Settings > My Jobs and add your first job. Define schedules, location and rates. Then you can start logging time from the main screen.

2.question: How do I record my work time?
2.answer: From the main screen, select your job and press the start button. The app will automatically start tracking your time. Press finish when you're done.

3.question: Can I edit my time records?
3.answer: Yes, go to the calendar and select any day to view your records. You can edit start time, end time and add notes.

4.question: How does geolocation work?
4.answer: The app uses your location to verify that you are at your workplace. You can set a tolerance radius in each job's settings.

5.question: How do I set up billing?
5.answer: In each job, go to the "Billing" tab and define your hourly rate. The app will automatically calculate your earnings based on time worked.

6.question: Is my data secure?
6.answer: All your data is stored locally on your device. We don't send personal information to external servers.

7.question: Can I export my data?
7.answer: Yes, you can export your data from the Reports screen. You can choose between PDF or Excel format for your time records.

8.question: Why isn't location working?
8.answer: Check that you have given location permissions to the app. Go to Device Settings > Privacy > Location and enable permissions.

9.question: Can I create notifications to remind me when I should go to work?
9.answer: Yes, on the calendar screen, when adding a schedule you'll see a button to create a notification that will remind you when to go to work.

10.question: Can I export work days to the phone's native calendar?
10.answer: Yes, from the calendar screen you can sync with your native calendar using the sync button.

11.question: Does the chatbot work with artificial intelligence?
11.answer: Yes, it works with Gemini 1.5 Pro and can analyze images of work schedules. It may make mistakes if the work plan is not well defined.

12.question: Does the app work without internet connection?
12.answer: Yes, it works perfectly without internet connection. Everything is stored locally, only the chatbot function for analyzing images requires connection.

13.question: Do I need a subscription for all features?
13.answer: To enjoy 100% of all features you need a premium subscription. The free version includes one job and basic features.

14.question: How does GPS Auto-Timer work?
14.answer: Auto-Timer automatically detects when you arrive or leave work using GPS. You can configure detection radius and delays for start/stop.

15.question: Can I generate professional invoices?
15.answer: Yes, the premium version includes a complete billing system with company data, tax calculation and professional PDF export.
